rows.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
rows.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
rows.transliteration: bismillāhir raḥmānir raḥīm

rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِىُّ ٱتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ وَٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
rows.translation: O Prophet! be careful of (your duty to) Allah and do not comply with (the wishes of) the unbelievers and the hypocrites; surely Allah is Knowing, Wise;
rows.transliteration: yā-ayyuhan nabiyyut-taqillāha walā tuṭi`il kāfirīna wal munāfiqīn ۗ innallāha kāna `alīman ḥakīmā

rows.arabic: وَٱتَّبِعْ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيْكَ مِن رَّبِّكَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرًا
rows.translation: And follow what is revealed to you from your Lord; surely Allah is Aware of what you do;
rows.transliteration: wattabi` mā yūḥā ilayka min rabbik ۚ innallāha kāna bimā ta`malūna khabīrā

rows.arabic: وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلًا
rows.translation: And rely on Allah; and Allah is sufficient for a Protector.
rows.transliteration: watawakkal `alallāh ۚ wakafā billāhi wakīlā

rows.arabic: مَّا جَعَلَ ٱللَّهُ لِرَجُلٍ مِّن قَلْبَيْنِ فِى جَوْفِهِۦ ۚ وَمَا جَعَلَ أَزْوَٰجَكُمُ ٱلَّـٰٓـِٔى تُظَـٰهِرُونَ مِنْهُنَّ أُمَّهَـٰتِكُمْ ۚ وَمَا جَعَلَ أَدْعِيَآءَكُمْ أَبْنَآءَكُمْ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ قَوْلُكُم بِأَفْوَٰهِكُمْ ۖ وَٱللَّهُ يَقُولُ ٱلْحَقَّ وَهُوَ يَهْدِى ٱلسَّبِيلَ
rows.translation: Allah has not made for any man two hearts within him; nor has He made your wives whose backs you liken to the backs of your mothers as your mothers, nor has He made those whom you assert to be your sons your real sons; these are the words of your mouths; and Allah speaks the truth and He guides to the way.
rows.transliteration: mā ja`alallāhu lirajulin min qalbayni fī jawfih ۚ wa mā ja`ala azwājakumul lā-ī tuẓāhirūna minhunna ummahātikum ۚ wa mā ja`ala ad`iyā-akum abnā-akum ۚ dhālikum qawlukum bi-afwāhikum ۖ wallāhu yaqūlul ḥaqqa wahuwa yahdis sabīl

rows.arabic: ٱدْعُوهُمْ لِـَٔابَآئِهِمْ هُوَ أَقْسَطُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ فَإِن لَّمْ تَعْلَمُوٓا۟ ءَابَآءَهُمْ فَإِخْوَٰنُكُمْ فِى ٱلدِّينِ وَمَوَٰلِيكُمْ ۚ وَلَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ فِيمَآ أَخْطَأْتُم بِهِۦ وَلَـٰكِن مَّا تَعَمَّدَتْ قُلُوبُكُمْ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا
rows.translation: Assert their relationship to their fathers; this is more equitable with Allah; but if you do not know their fathers, then they are your brethren in faith and your friends; and there is no blame on you concerning that in which you made a mistake, but (concerning) that which your hearts do purposely (blame may rest on you), and Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
rows.transliteration: ud-`ūhum li-ābā-ihim huwa aqsaṭu `indallāh ۚ fa-in lam ta`lamū ābā-ahum fa-ikhwānukum fid dīni wa mawālīkum ۚ walaysa `alaykum junāḥun fīmā akhṭa-tum bihi walākin mā ta`ammadat qulūbukum ۚ wakānallāhu ghafūran raḥīmā

rows.arabic: ٱلنَّبِىُّ أَوْلَىٰ بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ مِنْ أَنفُسِهِمْ ۖ وَأَزْوَٰجُهُۥٓ أُمَّهَـٰتُهُمْ ۗ وَأُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَرْحَامِ بَعْضُهُمْ أَوْلَىٰ بِبَعْضٍ فِى كِتَـٰبِ ٱللَّهِ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُهَـٰجِرِينَ إِلَّآ أَن تَفْعَلُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰٓ أَوْلِيَآئِكُم مَّعْرُوفًا ۚ كَانَ ذَٰلِكَ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مَسْطُورًا
rows.translation: The Prophet has a greater claim on the faithful than they have on themselves, and his wives are (as) their mothers; and the possessors of relationship have the better claim in the ordinance of Allah to inheritance, one with respect to another, than (other) believers, and (than) those who have fled (their homes), except that you do some good to your friends; this is written in the Book.
rows.transliteration: an-nabiyyu awlā bil mu-minīna min anfusihim ۖ wa-azwājuhu ummahātuhum ۗ wa-ulul-arḥāmi ba`ḍuhum awlā biba`ḍin fī kitābillāhi minal mu-minīna wal muhājirīna illā an taf`alū ilā awliyā-ikum ma`rūfā ۚ kāna dhālika fil kitābi masṭūrā

rows.arabic: وَإِذْ أَخَذْنَا مِنَ ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ مِيثَـٰقَهُمْ وَمِنكَ وَمِن نُّوحٍ وَإِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ وَعِيسَى ٱبْنِ مَرْيَمَ ۖ وَأَخَذْنَا مِنْهُم مِّيثَـٰقًا غَلِيظًا
rows.translation: And when We made a covenant with the prophets and with you, and with Nuh and Ibrahim and Musa and Isa, son of Marium, and We made with them a strong covenant
rows.transliteration: wa idh akhadhnā minan nabiyyīna mīthāqahum wa minka wa min nūḥin wa ibrāhīma wa mūsā wa`īsab-ni maryam ۖ wa-akhadhnā minhum mīthāqan ghalīẓā

rows.arabic: لِّيَسْـَٔلَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ عَن صِدْقِهِمْ ۚ وَأَعَدَّ لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
rows.translation: That He may question the truthful of their truth, and He has prepared for the unbelievers a painful punishment.
rows.transliteration: liyas-alaṣ ṣādiqīna `an ṣidqihim ۚ wa-a`adda lilkāfirīna `adhāban alīmā

rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱذْكُرُوا۟ نِعْمَةَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ إِذْ جَآءَتْكُمْ جُنُودٌ فَأَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ رِيحًا وَجُنُودًا لَّمْ تَرَوْهَا ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرًا
rows.translation: O you who believe! call to mind the favor of Allah to you when there came down upon you hosts, so We sent against them a strong wind and hosts, that you saw not, and Allah is Seeing what you do.
rows.transliteration: yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanudh-kurū ni`matallāhi `alaykum idh jā-at kum junūdun fa-arsalnā `alayhim rīḥan wajunūdal lam tarawhā ۚ wakānallāhu bimā ta`malūna baṣīrā

rows.arabic: إِذْ جَآءُوكُم مِّن فَوْقِكُمْ وَمِنْ أَسْفَلَ مِنكُمْ وَإِذْ زَاغَتِ ٱلْأَبْصَـٰرُ وَبَلَغَتِ ٱلْقُلُوبُ ٱلْحَنَاجِرَ وَتَظُنُّونَ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلظُّنُونَا۠
rows.translation: When they came upon you from above you and from below you, and when the eyes turned dull, and the hearts rose up to the throats, and you began to think diverse thoughts of Allah.
rows.transliteration: idh jā-ūkum min fawqikum wa min asfala minkum wa idh zāghatil-abṣāru wabalaghatil qulūbul ḥanājira wataẓunnūna billāhiẓ ẓunūnā

rows.arabic: هُنَالِكَ ٱبْتُلِىَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ وَزُلْزِلُوا۟ زِلْزَالًا شَدِيدًا
rows.translation: There the believers were tried and they were shaken with severe shaking.
rows.transliteration: hunālikab-tuliyal mu-minūna wazulzilū zilzālan shadīdā

rows.arabic: وَإِذْ يَقُولُ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ مَّا وَعَدَنَا ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥٓ إِلَّا غُرُورًا
rows.translation: And when the hypocrites and those in whose hearts was a disease began to say: Allah and His Apostle did not promise us (victory) but only to deceive.
rows.transliteration: wa idh yaqūlul munāfiqūna wal ladhīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun mā wa`adanallāhu warasūluhu illā ghurūrā

rows.arabic: وَإِذْ قَالَت طَّآئِفَةٌ مِّنْهُمْ يَـٰٓأَهْلَ يَثْرِبَ لَا مُقَامَ لَكُمْ فَٱرْجِعُوا۟ ۚ وَيَسْتَـْٔذِنُ فَرِيقٌ مِّنْهُمُ ٱلنَّبِىَّ يَقُولُونَ إِنَّ بُيُوتَنَا عَوْرَةٌ وَمَا هِىَ بِعَوْرَةٍ ۖ إِن يُرِيدُونَ إِلَّا فِرَارًا
rows.translation: And when a party of them said: O people of Yasrib! there is no place to stand for you (here), therefore go back; and a party of them asked permission of the prophet, saying. Surely our houses are exposed; and they were not exposed; they only desired to fly away.
rows.transliteration: wa idh qālat ṭā-ifatun minhum yā-ahla yathriba lā muqāma lakum farji`ū ۚ wayasta-dhinu farīqun minhumun nabiyya yaqūlūna inna buyūtanā `awratun wa mā hiya bi`awrah ۖ in yurīdūna illā firārā

rows.arabic: وَلَوْ دُخِلَتْ عَلَيْهِم مِّنْ أَقْطَارِهَا ثُمَّ سُئِلُوا۟ ٱلْفِتْنَةَ لَـَٔاتَوْهَا وَمَا تَلَبَّثُوا۟ بِهَآ إِلَّا يَسِيرًا
rows.translation: And if an entry were made upon them from the outlying parts of it, then they were asked to wage war, they would certainly have done it, and they would not have stayed in it but a little while.
rows.transliteration: walaw dukhilat `alayhim min aqṭārihā thumma su-ilul fitnata la-ātawhā wa mā talabbathū bihā illā yasīrā

rows.arabic: وَلَقَدْ كَانُوا۟ عَـٰهَدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مِن قَبْلُ لَا يُوَلُّونَ ٱلْأَدْبَـٰرَ ۚ وَكَانَ عَهْدُ ٱللَّهِ مَسْـُٔولًا
rows.translation: And certainly they had made a covenant with Allah before, that) they would not turn (their) backs; and Allah's covenant shall be inquired of.
rows.transliteration: walaqad kānū `āhadullāha min qablu lā yuwallūnal-adbār ۚ wakāna `ahdullāhi mas-ūlā

rows.arabic: قُل لَّن يَنفَعَكُمُ ٱلْفِرَارُ إِن فَرَرْتُم مِّنَ ٱلْمَوْتِ أَوِ ٱلْقَتْلِ وَإِذًا لَّا تُمَتَّعُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
rows.translation: Say: Flight shall not do you any good if you fly from death or slaughter, and in that case you will not be allowed to enjoy yourselves but a little.
rows.transliteration: qul lan yanfa`akumul firāru in farartum minal mawti awil qatli wa idhal lā tumatta`ūna illā qalīlā

rows.arabic: قُلْ مَن ذَا ٱلَّذِى يَعْصِمُكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ إِنْ أَرَادَ بِكُمْ سُوٓءًا أَوْ أَرَادَ بِكُمْ رَحْمَةً ۚ وَلَا يَجِدُونَ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيًّا وَلَا نَصِيرًا
rows.translation: Say: Who is it that can withhold you from Allah if He intends to do you evil, rather He intends to show you mercy? And they will not find for themselves besides Allah any guardian or a helper.
rows.transliteration: qul man dhal ladhī ya`ṣimukum minallāhi in arāda bikum sū-an aw arāda bikum raḥmah ۚ walā yajidūna lahum min dūnillāhi waliyyan walā naṣīrā

rows.arabic: قَدْ يَعْلَمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمُعَوِّقِينَ مِنكُمْ وَٱلْقَآئِلِينَ لِإِخْوَٰنِهِمْ هَلُمَّ إِلَيْنَا ۖ وَلَا يَأْتُونَ ٱلْبَأْسَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
rows.translation: Allah knows indeed those among you who hinder others and those who say to their brethren: Come to us; and they come not to the fight but a little,
rows.transliteration: qad ya`lamullāhul mu`awwiqīna minkum wal qā-ilīna li-ikhwānihim halumma ilaynā ۖ walā ya-tūnal ba-sa illā qalīlā

rows.arabic: أَشِحَّةً عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ فَإِذَا جَآءَ ٱلْخَوْفُ رَأَيْتَهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَيْكَ تَدُورُ أَعْيُنُهُمْ كَٱلَّذِى يُغْشَىٰ عَلَيْهِ مِنَ ٱلْمَوْتِ ۖ فَإِذَا ذَهَبَ ٱلْخَوْفُ سَلَقُوكُم بِأَلْسِنَةٍ حِدَادٍ أَشِحَّةً عَلَى ٱلْخَيْرِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَمْ يُؤْمِنُوا۟ فَأَحْبَطَ ٱللَّهُ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ ۚ وَكَانَ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرًا
rows.translation: Being niggardly with respect to you; but when fear comes, you will see them looking to you, their eyes rolling like one swooning because of death; but when the fear is gone they smite you with sharp tongues, being niggardly of the good things. These have not believed, therefore Allah has made their doing naught; and this is easy to Allah.
rows.transliteration: ashiḥḥatan `alaykum ۖ fa-idhā jā-al khawfu ra-aytahum yanẓurūna ilayka tadūru a`yunuhum kal ladhī yughshā `alayhi minal mawt ۖ fa-idhā dhahabal khawfu salaqūkum bi-alsinatin ḥidādin ashiḥḥatan `alal-khayr ۚ ulā-ika lam yu-minū fa-aḥbaṭallāhu a`mālahum ۚ wakāna dhālika `alallāhi yasīrā

rows.arabic: يَحْسَبُونَ ٱلْأَحْزَابَ لَمْ يَذْهَبُوا۟ ۖ وَإِن يَأْتِ ٱلْأَحْزَابُ يَوَدُّوا۟ لَوْ أَنَّهُم بَادُونَ فِى ٱلْأَعْرَابِ يَسْـَٔلُونَ عَنْ أَنۢبَآئِكُمْ ۖ وَلَوْ كَانُوا۟ فِيكُم مَّا قَـٰتَلُوٓا۟ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
rows.translation: They think the allies are not gone, and if the allies should come (again) they would fain be in the deserts with the desert Arabs asking for news about you, and if they were among you they would not fight save a little.
rows.transliteration: yaḥsabūnal-aḥzāba lam yadh-habū ۖ wa in ya-til-aḥzābu yawaddū law annahum bādūna fil-a`rābi yas-alūna `an anbā-ikum ۖ walaw kānū fīkum mā qātalū illā qalīlā

rows.arabic: لَّقَدْ كَانَ لَكُمْ فِى رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ أُسْوَةٌ حَسَنَةٌ لِّمَن كَانَ يَرْجُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلْيَوْمَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَ وَذَكَرَ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرًا
rows.translation: Certainly you have in the Apostle of Allah an excellent exemplar for him who hopes in Allah and the latter day and remembers Allah much.
rows.transliteration: laqad kāna lakum fī rasūlillāhi uswatun ḥasanatun liman kāna yarjullāha wal yawmal-ākhira wadhakarallāha kathīrā

rows.arabic: وَلَمَّا رَءَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ ٱلْأَحْزَابَ قَالُوا۟ هَـٰذَا مَا وَعَدَنَا ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ وَصَدَقَ ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ ۚ وَمَا زَادَهُمْ إِلَّآ إِيمَـٰنًا وَتَسْلِيمًا
rows.translation: And when the believers saw the allies, they said: This is what Allah and His Apostle promised us, and Allah and His Apostle spoke the truth; and it only increased them in faith and submission.
rows.transliteration: walammā ra al mu-minūnal-aḥzāba qālū hādhā mā wa`adanallāhu warasūluhu waṣadaqallāhu warasūluh ۚ wa mā zādahum illā-iymānan wataslīmā

rows.arabic: مِّنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ رِجَالٌ صَدَقُوا۟ مَا عَـٰهَدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ عَلَيْهِ ۖ فَمِنْهُم مَّن قَضَىٰ نَحْبَهُۥ وَمِنْهُم مَّن يَنتَظِرُ ۖ وَمَا بَدَّلُوا۟ تَبْدِيلًا
rows.translation: Of the believers are men who are true to the covenant which they made with Allah: so of them is he who accomplished his vow, and of them is he who yet waits, and they have not changed in the least
rows.transliteration: minal mu-minīna rijālun ṣadaqū mā `āhadullāha `alayh ۖ faminhum man qaḍā naḥbahu wa minhum man yantaẓir ۖ wa mā baddalū tabdīlā

rows.arabic: لِّيَجْزِىَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ بِصِدْقِهِمْ وَيُعَذِّبَ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ إِن شَآءَ أَوْ يَتُوبَ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا
rows.translation: That Allah may reward the truthful for their truth, and punish the hypocrites if He please or turn to them (mercifully); surely Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
rows.transliteration: liyajziyallāhuṣ ṣādiqīna biṣidqihim wayu`adhhibal munāfiqīna in shā-a aw yatūba `alayhim ۚ innallāha kāna ghafūran raḥīmā

rows.arabic: وَرَدَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِغَيْظِهِمْ لَمْ يَنَالُوا۟ خَيْرًا ۚ وَكَفَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ ٱلْقِتَالَ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ قَوِيًّا عَزِيزًا
rows.translation: And Allah turned back the unbelievers in their rage; they did not obtain any advantage, and Allah sufficed the believers in fighting; and Allah is Strong, Mighty.
rows.transliteration: waraddallāhul ladhīna kafarū bighayẓihim lam yanālū khayrā ۚ wakafallāhul mu-minīnal qitāl ۚ wakānallāhu qawiyyan `azīzā

rows.arabic: وَأَنزَلَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَـٰهَرُوهُم مِّنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مِن صَيَاصِيهِمْ وَقَذَفَ فِى قُلُوبِهِمُ ٱلرُّعْبَ فَرِيقًا تَقْتُلُونَ وَتَأْسِرُونَ فَرِيقًا
rows.translation: And He drove down those of the followers of the Book who backed them from their fortresses and He cast awe into their hearts; some you killed and you took captive another part.
rows.transliteration: wa-anzalal ladhīna ẓāharūhum min ahlil kitābi min ṣayāṣīhim waqadhafa fī qulūbihimur ru`ba farīqan taqtulūna wata-sirūna farīqā

rows.arabic: وَأَوْرَثَكُمْ أَرْضَهُمْ وَدِيَـٰرَهُمْ وَأَمْوَٰلَهُمْ وَأَرْضًا لَّمْ تَطَـُٔوهَا ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرًا
rows.translation: And He made you heirs to their land and their dwellings and their property, and (to) a land which you have not yet trodden, and Allah has power over all things.
rows.transliteration: wa-awrathakum arḍahum wadiyārahum wa-amwālahum wa-arḍal lam taṭa-ūhā ۚ wakānallāhu `alā kulli shay-in qadīrā

rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِىُّ قُل لِّأَزْوَٰجِكَ إِن كُنتُنَّ تُرِدْنَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَزِينَتَهَا فَتَعَالَيْنَ أُمَتِّعْكُنَّ وَأُسَرِّحْكُنَّ سَرَاحًا جَمِيلًا
rows.translation: O Prophet! say to your wives: If you desire this world's life and its adornment, then come, I will give you a provision and allow you to depart a goodly departing
rows.transliteration: yā-ayyuhan nabiyyu qul li-azwājika in kuntunna turidnal ḥayātad dunyā wazīnatahā fata`ālayna umatti`kunna wa-usarriḥkunna sarāḥan jamīlā

rows.arabic: وَإِن كُنتُنَّ تُرِدْنَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَٱلدَّارَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَعَدَّ لِلْمُحْسِنَـٰتِ مِنكُنَّ أَجْرًا عَظِيمًا
rows.translation: And if you desire Allah and His Apostle and the latter abode, then surely Allah has prepared for the doers of good among you a mighty reward.
rows.transliteration: wa in kuntunna turidnallāha warasūlahu wad dāral-ākhirata fa-innallāha a`adda lil-muḥsināti minkunna ajran `aẓīmā

rows.arabic: يَـٰنِسَآءَ ٱلنَّبِىِّ مَن يَأْتِ مِنكُنَّ بِفَـٰحِشَةٍ مُّبَيِّنَةٍ يُضَـٰعَفْ لَهَا ٱلْعَذَابُ ضِعْفَيْنِ ۚ وَكَانَ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرًا
rows.translation: O wives of the prophet! whoever of you commits an open indecency, the punishment shall be increased to her doubly; and this is easy to Allah.
rows.transliteration: yānisā-an nabiyyi man ya-ti minkunna bifāḥishatim mubayyinatin yuḍā`af lahal `adhābu ḍi`fayn ۚ wakāna dhālika `alallāhi yasīrā

rows.arabic: وَمَن يَقْنُتْ مِنكُنَّ لِلَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَتَعْمَلْ صَـٰلِحًا نُّؤْتِهَآ أَجْرَهَا مَرَّتَيْنِ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لَهَا رِزْقًا كَرِيمًا
rows.translation: And whoever of you is obedient to Allah and His Apostle and does good, We will give to her reward doubly, and We have prepared for her an honorable sustenance.
rows.transliteration: wa man yaqnut minkunna lillāhi warasūlihi wata`mal ṣāliḥan nu-tihā ajrahā marratayni wa-a`tadnā lahā rizqan karīmā

rows.arabic: يَـٰنِسَآءَ ٱلنَّبِىِّ لَسْتُنَّ كَأَحَدٍ مِّنَ ٱلنِّسَآءِ ۚ إِنِ ٱتَّقَيْتُنَّ فَلَا تَخْضَعْنَ بِٱلْقَوْلِ فَيَطْمَعَ ٱلَّذِى فِى قَلْبِهِۦ مَرَضٌ وَقُلْنَ قَوْلًا مَّعْرُوفًا
rows.translation: O wives of the Prophet! you are not like any other of the women; If you will be on your guard, then be not soft in (your) speech, lest he in whose heart is a disease yearn; and speak a good word.
rows.transliteration: yānisā-an nabiyyi lastunna ka-aḥadin minan nisā-i ۚ init-taqaytunna falā takhḍa`na bil qawli fayaṭma`al ladhī fī qalbihi maraḍun waqulna qawlan ma`rūfā

rows.arabic: وَقَرْنَ فِى بُيُوتِكُنَّ وَلَا تَبَرَّجْنَ تَبَرُّجَ ٱلْجَـٰهِلِيَّةِ ٱلْأُولَىٰ ۖ وَأَقِمْنَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتِينَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَطِعْنَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنَّمَا يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ لِيُذْهِبَ عَنكُمُ ٱلرِّجْسَ أَهْلَ ٱلْبَيْتِ وَيُطَهِّرَكُمْ تَطْهِيرًا
rows.translation: And stay in your houses and do not display your finery like the displaying of the ignorance of yore; and keep up prayer, and pay the poor-rate, and obey Allah and His Apostle. Allah only desires to keep away the uncleanness from you, O people of the House! and to purify you a (thorough) purifying.
rows.transliteration: waqarna fī buyūtikunna walā tabarrajna tabarrujal jāhiliyyatil-ūlā ۖ wa-aqimnaṣ ṣalāta wa-ātīnaz zakāta wa-aṭi`nallāha warasūlah ۚ innamā yurīdullāhu liyudh-hiba `ankumur rijsa ahlal-bayti wayuṭahhirakum taṭ-hīrā

rows.arabic: وَٱذْكُرْنَ مَا يُتْلَىٰ فِى بُيُوتِكُنَّ مِنْ ءَايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلْحِكْمَةِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ لَطِيفًا خَبِيرًا
rows.translation: And keep to mind what is recited in your houses of the communications of Allah and the wisdom; surely Allah is Knower of subtleties, Aware.
rows.transliteration: wadhkurna mā yutlā fī buyūtikunna min āyātillāhi wal ḥikmah ۚ innallāha kāna laṭīfan khabīrā

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ وَٱلْمُسْلِمَـٰتِ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ وَٱلْقَـٰنِتِينَ وَٱلْقَـٰنِتَـٰتِ وَٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ وَٱلصَّـٰدِقَـٰتِ وَٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ وَٱلصَّـٰبِرَٰتِ وَٱلْخَـٰشِعِينَ وَٱلْخَـٰشِعَـٰتِ وَٱلْمُتَصَدِّقِينَ وَٱلْمُتَصَدِّقَـٰتِ وَٱلصَّـٰٓئِمِينَ وَٱلصَّـٰٓئِمَـٰتِ وَٱلْحَـٰفِظِينَ فُرُوجَهُمْ وَٱلْحَـٰفِظَـٰتِ وَٱلذَّٰكِرِينَ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرًا وَٱلذَّٰكِرَٰتِ أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةً وَأَجْرًا عَظِيمًا
rows.translation: Surely the men who submit and the women who submit, and the believing men and the believing women, and the obeying men and the obeying women, and the truthful men and the truthful women, and the patient men and the patient women and the humble men and the humble women, and the almsgiving men and the almsgiving women, and the fasting men and the fasting women, and the men who guard their private parts and the women who guard, and the men who remember Allah much and the women who remember-- Allah has prepared for them forgiveness and a mighty reward.
rows.transliteration: innal muslimīna wal muslimāti wal mu-minīna wal mu-mināti wal qānitīna wal qānitāti waṣ ṣādiqīna waṣ ṣādiqāti waṣ ṣābirīna waṣ ṣābirāti wal khāshi`īna wal khāshi`āti wal mutaṣaddiqīna wal mutaṣaddiqāti waṣ ṣā-imīna waṣ ṣā-imāti wal ḥāfiẓīna furūjahum wal ḥāfiẓāti wadh dhākirīnallāha kathīran wadh dhākirāti a`addallāhu lahum maghfiratan wa-ajran `aẓīmā

rows.arabic: وَمَا كَانَ لِمُؤْمِنٍ وَلَا مُؤْمِنَةٍ إِذَا قَضَى ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥٓ أَمْرًا أَن يَكُونَ لَهُمُ ٱلْخِيَرَةُ مِنْ أَمْرِهِمْ ۗ وَمَن يَعْصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَقَدْ ضَلَّ ضَلَـٰلًا مُّبِينًا
rows.translation: And it behoves not a believing man and a believing woman that they should have any choice in their matter when Allah and His Apostle have decided a matter; and whoever disobeys Allah and His Apostle, he surely strays off a manifest straying.
rows.transliteration: wa mā kāna limu-minin walā mu-minatin idhā qaḍallāhu warasūluhu amran an yakūna lahumul khiyaratu min amrihim ۗ wa man ya`ṣillāha warasūlahu faqad ḍalla ḍalālan mubīnā

rows.arabic: وَإِذْ تَقُولُ لِلَّذِىٓ أَنْعَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَأَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِ أَمْسِكْ عَلَيْكَ زَوْجَكَ وَٱتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ وَتُخْفِى فِى نَفْسِكَ مَا ٱللَّهُ مُبْدِيهِ وَتَخْشَى ٱلنَّاسَ وَٱللَّهُ أَحَقُّ أَن تَخْشَىٰهُ ۖ فَلَمَّا قَضَىٰ زَيْدٌ مِّنْهَا وَطَرًا زَوَّجْنَـٰكَهَا لِكَىْ لَا يَكُونَ عَلَى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ حَرَجٌ فِىٓ أَزْوَٰجِ أَدْعِيَآئِهِمْ إِذَا قَضَوْا۟ مِنْهُنَّ وَطَرًا ۚ وَكَانَ أَمْرُ ٱللَّهِ مَفْعُولًا
rows.translation: And when you said to him to whom Allah had shown favor and to whom you had shown a favor: Keep your wife to yourself and be careful of (your duty to) Allah; and you concealed in your soul what Allah would bring to light, and you feared men, and Allah had a greater right that you should fear Him. But when Zaid had accomplished his want of her, We gave her to you as a wife, so that there should be no difficulty for the believers in respect of the wives of their adopted sons, when they have accomplished their want of them; and Allah's command shall be performed.
rows.transliteration: wa idh taqūlu lilladhī an`amallāhu `alayhi wa-an`amta `alayhi amsik `alayka zawjaka wattaqillāha watukhfī fī nafsika mallāhu mubdīhi watakhshan nāsa wallāhu aḥaqqu an takhshāh ۖ falammā qaḍā zaydun minhā waṭaran zawwajnākahā likay lā yakūna `alal-mu-minīna ḥarajun fī azwāji ad`iyā-ihim idhā qaḍaw minhunna waṭarā ۚ wakāna amrullāhi maf`ūlā

rows.arabic: مَّا كَانَ عَلَى ٱلنَّبِىِّ مِنْ حَرَجٍ فِيمَا فَرَضَ ٱللَّهُ لَهُۥ ۖ سُنَّةَ ٱللَّهِ فِى ٱلَّذِينَ خَلَوْا۟ مِن قَبْلُ ۚ وَكَانَ أَمْرُ ٱللَّهِ قَدَرًا مَّقْدُورًا
rows.translation: There is no harm in the Prophet doing that which Allah has ordained for him; such has been the course of Allah with respect to those who have gone before; and the command of Allah is a decree that is made absolute:
rows.transliteration: mā kāna `alan nabiyyi min ḥarajin fīmā faraḍallāhu lah ۖ sunnatallāhi fil ladhīna khalaw min qabl ۚ wakāna amrullāhi qadaran maqdūrā

rows.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُبَلِّغُونَ رِسَـٰلَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَخْشَوْنَهُۥ وَلَا يَخْشَوْنَ أَحَدًا إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ ۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ حَسِيبًا
rows.translation: Those who deliver the messages of Allah and fear Him, and do not fear any one but Allah; and Allah is sufficient to take account.
rows.transliteration: alladhīna yuballighūna risālātillāhi wayakhshawnahu walā yakhshawna aḥadan illallāh ۗ wakafā billāhi ḥasībā

rows.arabic: مَّا كَانَ مُحَمَّدٌ أَبَآ أَحَدٍ مِّن رِّجَالِكُمْ وَلَـٰكِن رَّسُولَ ٱللَّهِ وَخَاتَمَ ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمًا
rows.translation: Muhammad is not the father of any of your men, but he is the Apostle of Allah and the Last of the prophets; and Allah is cognizant of all things.
rows.transliteration: mā kāna muḥammadun abā aḥadin min rijālikum walākin rasūlallāhi wakhātaman nabiyyīn ۗ wakānallāhu bikulli shay-in `alīmā

rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱذْكُرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ذِكْرًا كَثِيرًا
rows.translation: O you who believe! remember Allah, remembering frequently,
rows.transliteration: yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanudh-kurullāha dhikran kathīrā

rows.arabic: وَسَبِّحُوهُ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
rows.translation: And glorify Him morning and evening.
rows.transliteration: wasabbiḥūhu bukratan wa-aṣīlā

rows.arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُصَلِّى عَلَيْكُمْ وَمَلَـٰٓئِكَتُهُۥ لِيُخْرِجَكُم مِّنَ ٱلظُّلُمَـٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِ ۚ وَكَانَ بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ رَحِيمًا
rows.translation: He it is Who sends His blessings on you, and (so do) His angels, that He may bring you forth out of utter darkness into the light; and He is Merciful to the believers.
rows.transliteration: huwal ladhī yuṣallī `alaykum wa malā-ikatuhu liyukhrijakum minaẓ ẓulumāti ilan nūr ۚ wakāna bil mu-minīna raḥīmā

rows.arabic: تَحِيَّتُهُمْ يَوْمَ يَلْقَوْنَهُۥ سَلَـٰمٌ ۚ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمْ أَجْرًا كَرِيمًا
rows.translation: Their salutation on the day that they meet Him shall be, Peace, and He has prepared for them an honourable reward.
rows.transliteration: taḥiyyatuhum yawma yalqawnahu salām ۚ wa-a`adda lahum ajran karīmā

rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِىُّ إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَـٰكَ شَـٰهِدًا وَمُبَشِّرًا وَنَذِيرًا
rows.translation: O Prophet! surely We have sent you as a witness, and as a bearer of good news and as a warner,
rows.transliteration: yā-ayyuhan nabiyyu innā arsalnāka shāhidan wa mubashhiran wanadhīrā

rows.arabic: وَدَاعِيًا إِلَى ٱللَّهِ بِإِذْنِهِۦ وَسِرَاجًا مُّنِيرًا
rows.translation: And as one inviting to Allah by His permission, and as a light-giving torch.
rows.transliteration: wadā`iyan ilallāhi bi-idhnihi wasirājan munīrā

rows.arabic: وَبَشِّرِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ بِأَنَّ لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ فَضْلًا كَبِيرًا
rows.translation: And give to the believers the good news that they shall have a great grace from Allah.
rows.transliteration: wabashhiril mu-minīna bi-anna lahum minallāhi faḍlan kabīrā

rows.arabic: وَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ وَٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ وَدَعْ أَذَىٰهُمْ وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلًا
rows.translation: And be not compliant to the unbelievers and the hypocrites, and leave unregarded their annoying talk, and rely on Allah; and Allah is sufficient as a Protector.
rows.transliteration: walā tuṭi`il kāfirīna wal munāfiqīna wada` adhāhum watawakkal `alallāh ۚ wakafā billāhi wakīlā

rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِذَا نَكَحْتُمُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ ثُمَّ طَلَّقْتُمُوهُنَّ مِن قَبْلِ أَن تَمَسُّوهُنَّ فَمَا لَكُمْ عَلَيْهِنَّ مِنْ عِدَّةٍ تَعْتَدُّونَهَا ۖ فَمَتِّعُوهُنَّ وَسَرِّحُوهُنَّ سَرَاحًا جَمِيلًا
rows.translation: O you who believe! when you marry the believing women, then divorce them before you touch them, you have in their case no term which you should reckon; so make some provision for them and send them forth a goodly sending forth.
rows.transliteration: yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanū idhā nakaḥtumul mu-mināti thumma ṭallaqtumūhunna min qabli an tamassūhunna famā lakum `alayhinna min `iddatin ta`taddūnahā ۖ famatti`ūhunna wasarriḥūhunna sarāḥan jamīlā

rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِىُّ إِنَّآ أَحْلَلْنَا لَكَ أَزْوَٰجَكَ ٱلَّـٰتِىٓ ءَاتَيْتَ أُجُورَهُنَّ وَمَا مَلَكَتْ يَمِينُكَ مِمَّآ أَفَآءَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْكَ وَبَنَاتِ عَمِّكَ وَبَنَاتِ عَمَّـٰتِكَ وَبَنَاتِ خَالِكَ وَبَنَاتِ خَـٰلَـٰتِكَ ٱلَّـٰتِى هَاجَرْنَ مَعَكَ وَٱمْرَأَةً مُّؤْمِنَةً إِن وَهَبَتْ نَفْسَهَا لِلنَّبِىِّ إِنْ أَرَادَ ٱلنَّبِىُّ أَن يَسْتَنكِحَهَا خَالِصَةً لَّكَ مِن دُونِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ ۗ قَدْ عَلِمْنَا مَا فَرَضْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ فِىٓ أَزْوَٰجِهِمْ وَمَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُهُمْ لِكَيْلَا يَكُونَ عَلَيْكَ حَرَجٌ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا
rows.translation: O Prophet! surely We have made lawful to you your wives whom you have given their dowries, and those whom your right hand possesses out of those whom Allah has given to you as prisoners of war, and the daughters of your paternal uncles and the daughters of your paternal aunts, and the daughters of your maternal uncles and the daughters of your maternal aunts who fled with you; and a believing woman if she gave herself to the Prophet, if the Prophet desired to marry her-- specially for you, not for the (rest of) believers; We know what We have ordained for them concerning their wives and those whom their right hands possess in order that no blame may attach to you; and Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
rows.transliteration: yā-ayyuhan nabiyyu innā aḥlalnā laka azwājakal lātī ātayta ujūrahunna wa mā malakat yamīnuka mimmā afā-allāhu `alayka wabanāti `ammika wabanāti `ammātika wabanāti khālika wabanāti khālātikal lātī hājarna ma`aka wamra-atan mu-minatan in wahabat nafsahā linnabiyyi in arādan nabiyyu an yastankiḥahā khāliṣatan laka min dūnil mu-minīn ۗ qad `alimnā mā faraḍnā `alayhim fī azwājihim wa mā malakat aymānuhum likaylā yakūna `alayka ḥaraj ۗ wakānallāhu ghafūran raḥīmā

rows.arabic: تُرْجِى مَن تَشَآءُ مِنْهُنَّ وَتُـْٔوِىٓ إِلَيْكَ مَن تَشَآءُ ۖ وَمَنِ ٱبْتَغَيْتَ مِمَّنْ عَزَلْتَ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكَ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ أَدْنَىٰٓ أَن تَقَرَّ أَعْيُنُهُنَّ وَلَا يَحْزَنَّ وَيَرْضَيْنَ بِمَآ ءَاتَيْتَهُنَّ كُلُّهُنَّ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِى قُلُوبِكُمْ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَلِيمًا
rows.translation: You may put off whom you please of them, and you may take to you whom you please, and whom you desire of those whom you had separated provisionally; no blame attaches to you; this is most proper, so that their eyes may be cool and they may not grieve, and that they should be pleased, all of them with what you give them, and Allah knows what is in your hearts; and Allah is Knowing, Forbearing.
rows.transliteration: turjī man tashā-u minhunna watu-wy ilayka man tashā-u ۖ wa manib-taghayta mimman `azalta falā junāḥa `alayk ۚ dhālika adnā an taqarra a`yunuhunna walā yaḥzanna wayarḍayna bimā ātaytahunna kulluhunn ۚ wallāhu ya`lamu mā fī qulūbikum ۚ wakānallāhu `alīman ḥalīmā

rows.arabic: لَّا يَحِلُّ لَكَ ٱلنِّسَآءُ مِنۢ بَعْدُ وَلَآ أَن تَبَدَّلَ بِهِنَّ مِنْ أَزْوَٰجٍ وَلَوْ أَعْجَبَكَ حُسْنُهُنَّ إِلَّا مَا مَلَكَتْ يَمِينُكَ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ رَّقِيبًا
rows.translation: It is not allowed to you to take women afterwards, nor that you should change them for other wives, though their beauty be pleasing to you, except what your right hand possesses and Allah is Watchful over all things.
rows.transliteration: lā yaḥillu lakan nisā-u min ba`du walā an tabaddala bihinna min azwājin walaw a`jabaka ḥusnuhunna illā mā malakat yamīnuk ۗ wakānallāhu `alā kulli shay-in raqībā

rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَدْخُلُوا۟ بُيُوتَ ٱلنَّبِىِّ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤْذَنَ لَكُمْ إِلَىٰ طَعَامٍ غَيْرَ نَـٰظِرِينَ إِنَىٰهُ وَلَـٰكِنْ إِذَا دُعِيتُمْ فَٱدْخُلُوا۟ فَإِذَا طَعِمْتُمْ فَٱنتَشِرُوا۟ وَلَا مُسْتَـْٔنِسِينَ لِحَدِيثٍ ۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكُمْ كَانَ يُؤْذِى ٱلنَّبِىَّ فَيَسْتَحْىِۦ مِنكُمْ ۖ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَسْتَحْىِۦ مِنَ ٱلْحَقِّ ۚ وَإِذَا سَأَلْتُمُوهُنَّ مَتَـٰعًا فَسْـَٔلُوهُنَّ مِن وَرَآءِ حِجَابٍ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ أَطْهَرُ لِقُلُوبِكُمْ وَقُلُوبِهِنَّ ۚ وَمَا كَانَ لَكُمْ أَن تُؤْذُوا۟ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِ وَلَآ أَن تَنكِحُوٓا۟ أَزْوَٰجَهُۥ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦٓ أَبَدًا ۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكُمْ كَانَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ عَظِيمًا
rows.translation: O you who believe! do not enter the houses of the Prophet unless permission is given to you for a meal, not waiting for its cooking being finished-- but when you are invited, enter, and when you have taken the food, then disperse-- not seeking to listen to talk; surely this gives the Prophet trouble, but he forbears from you, and Allah does not forbear from the truth And when you ask of them any goods, ask of them from behind a curtain; this is purer for your hearts and (for) their hearts; and it does not behove you that you should give trouble to the Apostle of Allah, nor that you should marry his wives after him ever; surely this is grievous in the sight of Allah.
rows.transliteration: yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanū lā tadkhulū buyūtan nabiyyi illā an yu-dhana lakum ilā ṭa`āmin ghayra nāẓirīna ināhu walākin idhā du`ītum fadkhulū fa-idhā ṭa`imtum fantashirū walā musta-nisīna liḥadīth ۚ inna dhālikum kāna yu-dhin nabiyya fayastaḥyī minkum ۖ wallāhu lā yastaḥyī minal ḥaqq ۚ wa idhā sa-altumūhunna matā`an fas-alūhunna min warā-i ḥijāb ۚ dhālikum aṭ-haru liqulūbikum waqulūbihinn ۚ wa mā kāna lakum an tu-dhū rasūlallāhi walā an tankiḥū azwājahu min ba`dihi abadā ۚ inna dhālikum kāna `indallāhi `aẓīmā

rows.arabic: إِن تُبْدُوا۟ شَيْـًٔا أَوْ تُخْفُوهُ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمًا
rows.translation: If you do a thing openly or do it in secret, then surely Allah is Cognizant of all things.
rows.transliteration: in tubdū shay-an aw tukhfūhu fa-innallāha kāna bikulli shay-in `alīmā

rows.arabic: لَّا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِنَّ فِىٓ ءَابَآئِهِنَّ وَلَآ أَبْنَآئِهِنَّ وَلَآ إِخْوَٰنِهِنَّ وَلَآ أَبْنَآءِ إِخْوَٰنِهِنَّ وَلَآ أَبْنَآءِ أَخَوَٰتِهِنَّ وَلَا نِسَآئِهِنَّ وَلَا مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُهُنَّ ۗ وَٱتَّقِينَ ٱللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ شَهِيدًا
rows.translation: There is no blame on them in respect of their fathers, nor their brothers, nor their brothers' sons, nor their sisters' sons nor their own women, nor of what their right hands possess; and be careful of (your duty to) Allah; surely Allah is a witness of all things.
rows.transliteration: lā junāḥa `alayhinna fī ābā-ihinna walā abnā-ihinna walā ikhwānihinna walā abnā-i ikhwānihinna walā abnā-i akhawātihinna walā nisā-ihinna walā mā malakat aymānuhunn ۗ wattaqīnallāh ۚ innallāha kāna `alā kulli shay-in shahīdā

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ وَمَلَـٰٓئِكَتَهُۥ يُصَلُّونَ عَلَى ٱلنَّبِىِّ ۚ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ صَلُّوا۟ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلِّمُوا۟ تَسْلِيمًا
rows.translation: Surely Allah and His angels bless the Prophet; O you who believe! call for (Divine) blessings on him and salute him with a (becoming) salutation.
rows.transliteration: innallāha wa malā-ikatahu yuṣallūna `alan nabiyy ۚ yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanū ṣallū `alayhi wasallimū taslīmā

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْذُونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ لَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا مُّهِينًا
rows.translation: Surely (as for) those who speak evil things of Allah and His Apostle, Allah has cursed them in this world and the here after, and He has prepared for them a chastisement bringing disgrace.
rows.transliteration: innal ladhīna yu-dhūnallāha warasūlahu la`anahumullāhu fid dunyā wal-ākhirati wa-a`adda lahum `adhāban muhīnā

rows.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْذُونَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ بِغَيْرِ مَا ٱكْتَسَبُوا۟ فَقَدِ ٱحْتَمَلُوا۟ بُهْتَـٰنًا وَإِثْمًا مُّبِينًا
rows.translation: And those who speak evil things of the believing men and the believing women without their having earned (it), they are guilty indeed of a false accusation and a manifest sin.
rows.transliteration: wal ladhīna yu-dhūnal mu-minīna wal mu-mināti bighayri mak-tasabū faqadiḥ-tamalū buhtānan wa ithman mubīnā

rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِىُّ قُل لِّأَزْوَٰجِكَ وَبَنَاتِكَ وَنِسَآءِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ يُدْنِينَ عَلَيْهِنَّ مِن جَلَـٰبِيبِهِنَّ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ أَدْنَىٰٓ أَن يُعْرَفْنَ فَلَا يُؤْذَيْنَ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا
rows.translation: O Prophet! say to your wives and your daughters and the women of the believers that they let down upon them their over-garments; this will be more proper, that they may be known, and thus they will not be given trouble; and Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
rows.transliteration: yā-ayyuhan nabiyyu qul li-azwājika wabanātika wanisā-il mu-minīna yudnīna `alayhinna min jalābībihinn ۚ dhālika adnā an yu`rafna falā yu-dhayn ۗ wakānallāhu ghafūran raḥīmā

rows.arabic: لَّئِن لَّمْ يَنتَهِ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ وَٱلْمُرْجِفُونَ فِى ٱلْمَدِينَةِ لَنُغْرِيَنَّكَ بِهِمْ ثُمَّ لَا يُجَاوِرُونَكَ فِيهَآ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
rows.translation: If the hypocrites and those in whose hearts is a disease and the agitators in the city do not desist, We shall most certainly set you over them, then they shall not be your neighbors in it but for a little while;
rows.transliteration: la-in lam yantahil munāfiqūna wal ladhīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun wal murjifūna fil madīnati lanughriyannaka bihim thumma lā yujāwirūnaka fīhā illā qalīlā

rows.arabic: مَّلْعُونِينَ ۖ أَيْنَمَا ثُقِفُوٓا۟ أُخِذُوا۟ وَقُتِّلُوا۟ تَقْتِيلًا
rows.translation: Cursed: wherever they are found they shall be seized and murdered, a (horrible) murdering.
rows.transliteration: mal`ūnīn ۖ aynamā thuqifū ukhidhū waquttilū taqtīlā

rows.arabic: سُنَّةَ ٱللَّهِ فِى ٱلَّذِينَ خَلَوْا۟ مِن قَبْلُ ۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ ٱللَّهِ تَبْدِيلًا
rows.translation: (Such has been) the course of Allah with respect to those who have gone before; and you shall not find any change in the course of Allah.
rows.transliteration: sunnatallāhi fil ladhīna khalaw min qabl ۖ walan tajida lisunnatil lāhi tabdīlā

rows.arabic: يَسْـَٔلُكَ ٱلنَّاسُ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِ ۖ قُلْ إِنَّمَا عِلْمُهَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ تَكُونُ قَرِيبًا
rows.translation: Men ask you about the hour; say: The knowledge of it is only with Allah, and what will make you comprehend that the hour may be nigh.
rows.transliteration: yas-alukan nāsu `anis sā`ah ۖ qul innamā `il-muhā `indallāh ۚ wa mā yudrīka la`allas sā`ata takūnu qarībā

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمْ سَعِيرًا
rows.translation: Surely Allah has cursed the unbelievers and has prepared for them a burning fire,
rows.transliteration: innallāha la`anal kāfirīna wa-a`adda lahum sa`īrā

rows.arabic: خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا ۖ لَّا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيًّا وَلَا نَصِيرًا
rows.translation: To abide therein for a long time; they shall not find a protector or a helper.
rows.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā abadā ۖ lā yajidūna waliyyan walā naṣīrā

rows.arabic: يَوْمَ تُقَلَّبُ وُجُوهُهُمْ فِى ٱلنَّارِ يَقُولُونَ يَـٰلَيْتَنَآ أَطَعْنَا ٱللَّهَ وَأَطَعْنَا ٱلرَّسُولَا۠
rows.translation: On the day when their faces shall be turned back into the fire, they shall say: O would that we had obeyed Allah and obeyed the Apostle!
rows.transliteration: yawma tuqallabu wujūhuhum fin nāri yaqūlūna yālaytanā aṭa`nallāha wa-aṭa`nar rasūlā

rows.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَآ إِنَّآ أَطَعْنَا سَادَتَنَا وَكُبَرَآءَنَا فَأَضَلُّونَا ٱلسَّبِيلَا۠
rows.translation: And they shall say: O our Lord! surely we obeyed our leaders and our great men, so they led us astray from the path;
rows.transliteration: waqālū rabbanā innā aṭa`nā sādatanā wakubarā-anā fa-aḍallūnas sabīlā

rows.arabic: رَبَّنَآ ءَاتِهِمْ ضِعْفَيْنِ مِنَ ٱلْعَذَابِ وَٱلْعَنْهُمْ لَعْنًا كَبِيرًا
rows.translation: O our Lord! give them a double punishment and curse them with a great curse.
rows.transliteration: rabbanā ātihim ḍi`fayni minal `adhābi wal `anhum la`nan kabīrā

rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَكُونُوا۟ كَٱلَّذِينَ ءَاذَوْا۟ مُوسَىٰ فَبَرَّأَهُ ٱللَّهُ مِمَّا قَالُوا۟ ۚ وَكَانَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَجِيهًا
rows.translation: O you who believe! be not like those who spoke evil things of Musa, but Allah cleared him of what they said, and he was worthy of regard with Allah.
rows.transliteration: yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanū lā takūnū kal ladhīna ādhaw mūsā fabarra-ahullāhu mimmā qālū ۚ wakāna `indallāhi wajīhā

rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَقُولُوا۟ قَوْلًا سَدِيدًا
rows.translation: O you who believe! be careful of (your duty to) Allah and speak the right word,
rows.transliteration: yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanut-taqullāha waqūlū qawlan sadīdā

rows.arabic: يُصْلِحْ لَكُمْ أَعْمَـٰلَكُمْ وَيَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ ذُنُوبَكُمْ ۗ وَمَن يُطِعِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَقَدْ فَازَ فَوْزًا عَظِيمًا
rows.translation: He will put your deeds into a right state for you, and forgive you your faults; and whoever obeys Allah and His Apostle, he indeed achieves a mighty success.
rows.transliteration: yuṣliḥ lakum a`mālakum wayaghfir lakum dhunūbakum ۗ wa man yuṭi`illāha warasūlahu faqad fāza fawzan `aẓīmā

rows.arabic: إِنَّا عَرَضْنَا ٱلْأَمَانَةَ عَلَى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَٱلْجِبَالِ فَأَبَيْنَ أَن يَحْمِلْنَهَا وَأَشْفَقْنَ مِنْهَا وَحَمَلَهَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ ظَلُومًا جَهُولًا
rows.translation: Surely We offered the trust to the heavens and the earth and the mountains, but they refused to be unfaithful to it and feared from it, and man has turned unfaithful to it; surely he is unjust, ignorant;
rows.transliteration: innā `araḍnal-amānata `alas samāwāti wal-arḍi wal jibāli fa-abayna an yaḥmilnahā wa-ashfaqna minhā waḥamalahal-insān ۖ innahu kāna ẓalūman jahūlā

rows.arabic: لِّيُعَذِّبَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ وَٱلْمُنَـٰفِقَـٰتِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ وَٱلْمُشْرِكَـٰتِ وَيَتُوبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًۢا
rows.translation: So Allah will chastise the hypocritical men and the hypocritical women and the polytheistic men and the polytheistic women, and Allah will turn (mercifully) to the believing women, and Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
rows.transliteration: liyu`adhhiballāhul munāfiqīna wal munāfiqāti wal mushrikīna wal mushrikāti wayatūballāhu `alal-mu-minīna wal mu-mināt ۗ wakānallāhu ghafūran raḥīmā
